start.errorNoId: Could not determine your Telegram ID.
help.text:
*Available commands:*

/start — register and greet
/help — show this help message
/products — list your added products
/add <product_name> — add a product by name (e.g., apple)
/remove <product_name> — remove a product from your list
/clear — clear your entire product list
/upload — upload a photo of your fridge for product recognition
/recipes — get recipe suggestions based on your products and favorites
/favorites — show your saved favorite recipes
/menu — show the main menu with buttons
products.noItems: You have no products. Use /add or /upload to add.
upload.promptPhoto: Please send a photo of your fridge contents.
upload.noPhoto: ❗ Please use /upload first, then send a photo.
upload.getFileError: 🚨 Failed to get file from Telegram. Try again later.
upload.downloadTimeout: 🚨 Download timeout. Please try again later.
upload.downloadError: 🚨 Error downloading image. Please try again.
upload.recognitionError: 🚨 Recognition service error. Please try later.
upload.noProductsDetected: ℹ No products detected with ≥ 50% confidence.
upload.noneInCatalog: ⚠ None of the detected products found in catalog.
upload.cacheExpired: ⚠ Data expired. Please send the photo again via /upload.
error.global: 🚨 Something went wrong. Please try again.
menu.prompt: Please choose an action from the menu:
recipes.noResults: No recipes found based on your products. Please add more ingredients.
favorites.noItems: You have no saved recipes. Use /recipes to find some.
clear.alreadyEmpty: Your product list is already empty.
productPrompt.add.alreadyExists: ℹ This product is already in your list
productPrompt.remove.notInList: ℹ This product is not in your list
productPrompt.add.none: ✅ All found products are already in your list.
productPrompt.list.empty: ⚠️ You have removed all products. Add new via "➕ Add".
